backend/main.mo: Defines cafe, city, and area types with in‑memory Map storage and provides add, list, search, and get‑by‑id query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required map replacement and map/list coordination with associated files and test metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files, describing routing, components, hooks, styling, and map implementation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark mode themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for search and cafe details pages using AppLayout as the root.
frontend/src/components/cafes/CafeCard.t: Displays cafe information as a clickable card with optional selection state and navigation to cafe details.
frontend/src/components/cafes/CafeTileMa: Canvas‑based OpenStreetMap tile renderer with Web Mercator math, marker interactions, and selection/centering support.
frontend/src/components/cafes/EmptyState: Shows contextual empty‑state messages depending on search input and results.
frontend/src/components/cafes/LoadingSta: Renders skeleton placeholders for cafe list loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with header, footer, and main outlet region.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays footer with attribution and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Renders sticky header with logo and navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCafeDetails.ts: Fetches detailed cafe data by ID using the authenticated actor with caching and disabled retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCafeSearch.ts: Performs a text-based cafe search through the actor, returning empty results when no keyword is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CafeDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed cafe information by ID with loading, error, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/CafeSearchPage.tsx: Implements a search UI for cafes with keyword/city filters, list and map views, and result interactions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, plugins, and extended utilities for the project.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current build state, requirements, features, and issues, including notes about replacing Google Maps with a deployable tile-based map. It also tracks existing frontend/backend features and known deployment problems.
